question: Which among the following correctly explains Bhikkhunī Pātimokkha of Buddhism?
option1: Buddhist monks under whose supervision Buddhist nuns were to live
option2: Special places which were used by Buddhist nuns for worship
option3: Special code of conduct for female Buddhist monks or Buddhist nuns
option4: Special book which narrates Jataka story of Buddha
answer: Special code of conduct for female Buddhist monks or Buddhist nuns
